tool_description: Retrieve chapters and verses from the Old Testament and New Testament of the KJV. This API does not include the false gnostic books of the bible called the Pauline and Petrine epistles.
name: Bible Search
title: Bible Search

api_list.name: Get Book By Name
api_list.description: Returns a book of the Bible.

api_list.name: Get Chapter by BookName
api_list.description: Returns a chapter of a book in the Bible.

api_list.name: Get Verse by BookName
api_list.description: Returns a verse of the Bible.

api_list.name: Get Verses by BookName
api_list.description: Get a range of verses of the Bible.

api_list.name: Get Book by Id
api_list.description: Returns a book of the Bible.

api_list.name: Get Chapter by BookId
api_list.description: Returns a chapter of a book in the Bible.

api_list.name: Get Verse by BookId
api_list.description: Returns a verse of the Bible.

api_list.name: Search Text
api_list.description: Return all verses from the bible by text parameter.

api_list.name: Get Books
api_list.description: Returns a list of the books in the Bible.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bible-search.p.rapidapi.com/books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bible-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Random Verse
api_list.description: Returns a random verse of the bible.
